DataElement.preferredDefinition: the first date related to the response of the disease MDS (myelodysplastic Syndrome; abnormal bone marrow cells that may lead to myelogenous leukemia).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the response of the disease MDS (myelodysplastic Syndrome; abnormal bone marrow cells that may lead to myelogenous leukemia).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) is a clonal hematopoietic disorder characterized by dysplasia and ineffective hematopoiesis in one or more of the hematopoietic cell lines.  The dysplasia may be accompanied by an increase in myeloblasts, but the number is less than 20%, which, according to the WHO guidelines, is the requisite threshold for the diagnosis of acute myeloid leukemia.  MDS may occur de novo or as a result of exposure to alkylating agents and/or radiotherapy.  (WHO, 2001) -- 2003

Concepts.definition: A clonal hematopoietic disorder characterized by dysplasia and ineffective hematopoiesis in one or more of the hematopoietic cell lines. The dysplasia may be accompanied by an increase in myeloblasts, but the number is less than 20%, which, according to the WHO guidelines, is the requisite threshold for the diagnosis of acute myeloid leukemia. It may occur de novo or as a result of exposure to alkylating agents and/or radiotherapy. (WHO, 2001)

Property.preferredDefinition: Response is any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

Concepts.definition: Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the first date of an assessment, test, or treatment.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

DataElement.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
